channel.title: Peter Van Loan
channel.description: Recent news about Peter Van Loan, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Simcoe.com
item.description:
Van Loan wants to split town into two ridings
Innisfil's municipal politicians recently learned MP Peter Van Loan filed an objection to the proposed creation of a Barrie-Innisfil riding for the next federal election in October, 2015. The Federal Election Boundaries Commission of Ontario held hearings earlier ...

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Georgina to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth and ...
4, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), along with Peter Van Loan, Member of Parliament for York-Simcoe, was in the Toronto area today to discuss the role of FedDev Ontario in the region ... "I'm pleased to be here in York-Simcoe with my colleague MP Van Loan to participate in a roundtable discussion to make certain we continue to create programs that help the businesses and workers in this community.".

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Harper opts for good cop-bad cop tactic with his caucus, reaffirms Van Loan, but ...
Conservative insiders and opposition MPs alike are surprised Government House Leader Peter Van Loan got to keep is job in the recent Cabinet shuffle, and say it shows the government's take-no-prisoners approach in the House will continue. “The Prime Minister doesn't ... NDP MP Paul Dewar (Ottawa Centre, Ont.), then-defence minister Peter MacKay (Central Nova, N.S.) and other MPs also got up and walked over to Mr. Cullen's desk and Mr. MacKay looked like he was breaking up a fight. Mr. Van Loan later ...

item.title: Mentioned by Simcoe.com
item.description:
Thornhill MP not upset at losing cabinet post
Another cabinet minister, York-Simcoe MP Peter Van Loan, was kept on as the government House leader. Mr. Van Loan welcomed his retention of the role he's held since 2011. It's the job of the government House leader to get legislation passed and the ...

item.title: Introduced legislation
